text: "The Bug" is a 1992 song by British rock band Dire Straits and was taken from their sixth studio album On Every Street. It went to number 21 in Canada and was covered by Mary Chapin Carpenter in 1993. == Track listings == 7-inch vinyl single # "The Bug" # "Twisting by the Pool" 5-inch CD single # "The Bug" # "Twisting by the Pool" # "Expresso Love" # "Walk of Life" ==References== Category:1992 songs Category:Dire Straits songs Category:Mary Chapin Carpenter songs
title: The Bug
